mapper.select: select a.lesson_apply_attendance_status as attendanceStatus, b.lesson_no as "lesson.no", b.lesson_name as "lesson.name", c.user_name as "user.name", b.lesson_date as "lesson.date", b.lesson_time as "lesson.time" from helf_lesson_apply a, helf_lesson b, helf_users c where a.lesson_no = b.lesson_no and b.user_id = c.user_id and a.user_id = #{value}

select a.lesson_no as no, a.lesson_name as name, a.lesson_req_cnt as reqCnt, a.lesson_quota as quota, a.lesson_date as "date", a.lesson_time as time, b.user_name from helf_lesson a, helf_users b where a.user_id =b.user_id and a.user_id =#{value} order by a.lesson_no asc

select a.lesson_apply_attendance_status as attendanceStatus, b.lesson_no as "lesson.no", a.user_id as "user.id", c.user_name as "user.name" from helf_lesson_apply a, helf_lesson b, helf_users c where a.lesson_no = b.lesson_no and a.user_id = c.user_id and a.lesson_no = #{value}
